Package application.controller

Class AppController

java.lang.Object
application.controller.AppController
public class AppController extends Object
This class facilitates the input from the user, the buttons, the algorithm to for evaluating the input, and the output. This class acts as the brain of the application.
Author:
Nichol John F. Famadico

    • setMain

      public void setMain(Main main)
      This method is called by the Main class to integrate its instance with the controller. Furthermore, it also initializes the corresponding fields with their initial values.
      Parameters:
      main - Passes the reference to the instance of the Main class.

    • evaluate

      private void evaluate()
      This method is called after clicking the "Evaluate" button in the GUI.

    • checkErrors

      private boolean checkErrors()
      This method checks if there are errors in the user input.
      Returns:
      True if there are errors detected, False if otherwise.
